column5: That first picture of a brown is really well composed. The fish suits the 'rustic' background. Nice going, ehg
Hey Mike.. wanna go Muskie fishing. I'll bring all the gear... you bring that horseshoe of yours along bud !
Beautiful pics solo!

Beautiful photo's Solo. If you have some other shots along that line i'd like to see them. Don't get to see to many good pictures of browns.  You've been on a pretty good streak this year. Keep it up!  -Dave
DITTO   Your doing it again solopaddler...making me green with envy.  Thanks for posting...the colours on those fish are awesome.
I'd love to seriously! I think I'd need that horeshoe for muskie fishing. Ehh...not so much for steelhead fishing.

Solo I'll have to agree with the other board members, you make this way to easy and we all become jealous. It leaves me to wonder if your job sits on the edge of some fabulous river where you can cast out the window and work at the same time.?? Man some guys have all the luck
Actually his job sits on the edge of acres of ashphalt!!!!
Mike, nice pics, another jealous angler here. I've yet to hook up with a brown (ever). I'd like to join your "fishing for browns 101 class" when you start one up.  Seriously, nice fish.  Stan
Its that Alaskan roe,its gotta be Great pics, very nice shots

Mike is the generousest pro I would ever hope to meet.  Just offer gas and gweeches, and be ready to go at the drop of a hat, and you will learn stuff, and catch many many feesh.  No ham but salami and pastrami are well received.
congrats mike what a day awesome
that is a great looking pic... nice

This will be short and sweet. For those of you who fish a particular trib for browns, they're in thick. Caught a bunch today (plus 1/2 a dozen bonus steelhead). Great day on the water!      Let the stampede begin!
What the #$%$%$&%  You gotta stop making this look so easy
Tie a yellow ribbon round the old...  Very nice Solo!
And I thought I had a good day
nice pics   hey isn't that ...oh never mind.  thanks for sharing  TB
nice solo, very nice
how do you say sweeeet!!!!!  First pic has a nice composition to it--------------so I saved it to my album for a desktop theme
Ill be seeing you all very soon lol
I would pay for you to come up North and teach me how to do it!  I dont know if you are just reporting how you did or showing off..  Very nice!
Mike should have his own fishing show ... "How to make other anglers jealous!"  NICE!
and    BONK!  p.-
Sweet brownie mike !!!  ..awesome pics too...cheers
nice looking fish solo!  looking at the pictures doesnt help much, i wont be getting out until friday
Anders...he's not showing off....he only showed a few pics of browns...LOL.  Great stuff Mike...as usual....  Oh yeah....I still hate you even though you take me fishing sometimes.....
Vague report  ... but very nice pics!!!  Thanks for sharing that!!!
wow....the money i'd pay for you to take me to that spot.....lol but i wouldn't mind fishin with ya sometiem haha.....great season ur havin solo!   Hawk
Shut yer pie hole oh shirtless one  .
the duckweed pretty much gives it away Im bringing the white bucket.
Nice Mike.   Too bad we couldn't meet up today...looking forward to the weekend though!  Here's a few "from the other direction".
Whut???  ... was it something I said?  I gotta tell ya, out of all the salmonoids... I find Brown Trout to be the most beautiful and desireable!!!  They are first on my Salmonoid "To Catch" list!!!
WTG Mike my favorite trout shots are browns.
Great stuff buddy, wish I could have been there!
How about a dam in New York state.
WTG  solo  Nice browns
